name: Asteroids Alpha
description:
Asteroids Alpha

Is Based On the original Asteroids Game.

However Its Has More Content And Levels are Pretty Much Endless.

This Is For WINDOWS

All Animation, Graphics, Sounds ETC are done by me an me alone.

I was going to fix the one display bug and put a level limit in.

However due to lack of funds i could not afford to keep paying for the DEV software.

==Controls==

=[Directions]=

right arrow = turn right
left arrow  = turn left
up arrow    = forward (direction yoiu are facing)
down arrow  = stop (will instantly stop)

=[weapon keys]=(can level up to 5)
z = Bullet
x = lazor
c = wave blast

=[special weapon]=
v = gigavolt (available from game level 10 onwards)
this is the only weapon the can be fired while shield/bubble is active

=[Ultimate Weapon]=
A = Rapidfire (available once player level is at 5 and game level is 10 or more)

=[other keys]=
s = shield/bubble (destroys anything that touches it)
0(zero) = level up weapons ( all weapons level at once)
p = pause

However I Hope Everyone Enjoys It.

Once you unzip/rar you will find the installer it is less than 100MB hdd space, it purely uses ram and cpu. 

Created with game maker studio

for donations please us my paypal email:

mystuffmyway@hotmail.com

thank you all
